RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: judge who took judicial notice of the sunset time in Laredo, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge: testified about not knowing the owners of the Moglia ranch house and Stag ranch trailer, or the land on San Pablo Road
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Moglia Ranch House: ranch house located near San Pablo Road, ownership unknown to Agent Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Stag Ranch Trailer: trailer located near San Pablo Road, ownership unknown to Agent Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Pablo Road: road where the Moglia ranch house and Stag ranch trailer are located, with unknown land ownership
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Officer Reymundo Reyes: explained that stolen vehicles may not be reported immediately, which did not alleviate his concerns about the black Dodge pickup truck
defendant whose brother IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. was involved in the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: city where the sun set at 6:22 p.m. on February 4, 2013
